explanation: [0-0] In an amusement park, a man wearing a red and white striped shirt and a Santa hat is performing by showing off his large belly. Next to him is a young woman in a brown crop top and black pants, with her hands on the straps of her backpack. In the background, there are several stalls selling things.

[0-7] Then the man in the red and white striped shirt follows behind the young woman in the brown crop top, imitating her movements as they walk down the road. The tourists around them watch with amusement, and then the young woman turns to look at the man in the red and white striped shirt.
